author: shaie
msg: LUCENE-2891: fix IndexWriterConfig to accept readerTermsIndexDivisor=-1

author: kkolinko
msg: Be consistent with locks on sessionCreationTiming, sessionExpirationTiming
in DeltaManager.resetStatistics(): use the same lock as elsewhere.

author: sarowe
msg: Added mvn cmdline option -B (batch mode) to hopefully improve download progress output

author: kkolinko
msg: - Do not throw NPE when recycle() is called more than once.
- Do not recycle the request in CoyoteAdapter#log() if it was not created there.

author: sarowe
msg: Switched from tools/maven/latest2/ to tools/maven/latest2.2 (latest2 is v2.0.9, and Uwe symlinked latest2.2 to v2.2.1); common-maven.sh now holds commands shared by the trunk and 3.x Maven builds, and is sourced from the scripts for each of them
